sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for observing crude drugs and plant tissues using a compound microscope.
sections.scope: Applicable to microscopic studies in the Pharmacognosy laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the microscope is clean and properly placed.
Place the prepared slide on the stage.
Adjust the objective lens to low power.
Focus the specimen using coarse and fine adjustment knobs.
Observe the specimen and note characteristics.
After use, switch OFF the microscope and cover it properly.
sections.precautions: Handle slides carefully. Do not touch lenses with bare fingers.
